blocks.name: bdayfun
blocks.content: The birthday function is a function. (Contributed by Scott Fenton, 14-Jun-2011.)

blocks.name: bdayfn
blocks.content: The birthday function is a function over ` No ` . (Contributed by Scott Fenton, 30-Jun-2011.)

blocks.name: bdaydm
blocks.content: The birthday function's domain is ` No ` . (Contributed by Scott Fenton, 14-Jun-2011.)

blocks.name: bdayrn
blocks.content: The birthday function's range is ` On ` . (Contributed by Scott Fenton, 14-Jun-2011.)

blocks.name: bdayelon
blocks.content: The value of the birthday function is always an ordinal. (Contributed by Scott Fenton, 14-Jun-2011.) (Proof shortened by Scott Fenton, 8-Dec-2021.)

blocks.name: nocvxminlem
blocks.content: Lemma for ~ nocvxmin . Given two birthday-minimal elements of a convex class of surreals, they are not comparable. (Contributed by Scott Fenton, 30-Jun-2011.)

blocks.content: Given a nonempty convex class of surreals, there is a unique birthday-minimal element of that class. (Contributed by Scott Fenton, 30-Jun-2011.)
